mutants.code:
import heapq

def minimumSize(nums, maxOperations):
    heap = [-num for num in nums]
    heapq.heapify(heap)
    while maxOperations >= 0:
        max_val = -heapq.heappop(heap)
        (quotient, remainder) = divmod(max_val, 2)
        heapq.heappush(heap, -quotient)
        if remainder > 0:
            heapq.heappush(heap, -remainder)
        maxOperations -= 1
    return -heap[0]

import heapq

def minimumSize(nums, maxOperations):
    heap = [-num for num in nums]
    heapq.heapify(heap)
    while maxOperations > 0:
        max_val = -heapq.heappop(heap)
        (quotient, remainder) = divmod(max_val, 2)
        heapq.heappush(heap, -quotient)
        if remainder > 0:
            heapq.heappush(heap, +remainder)
        maxOperations -= 1
    return -heap[0]
